DOC.brief_title: In Utero Magnesium Sulfate Exposure : Effects Extremely-Low-Birth-Weight Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Retrospective study suggest risk cerebral palsy intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) extremely premature infant mother give magnesium sulfate ( MgSO4 ) may reduce . The purpose study examine effect MgSO4 exposure adverse outcome extremely low birth weight ( ELBW ) infant . For infant include NICHD Neonatal Research Network Generic Database , data prospectively collect maternal/infant condition MgSO4 exposure ( include indication , time duration exposure ) .
